titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 557) to restore the broad scope of coverage and to clarify the application of title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, and title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-508.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/1/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 557 (Civil Rights Restoration Act of 1987).
